name: Don't Stop
description: This is an adventure game, you will use modern firearms to fight against strange alien creatures, collect various props and skills to survive.

name: Stack,Clack,Clock!
description: Stack, Clack, Clock! is a game about stacking bricks, where players build a tower one brick at a time.

name: Hoppy Square DX
description: It's hip to be square, and no square is hipper or hoppier than a Hoppy Square!

name: Puzzled Towers
description: This is a tower defense style game set in a dynamic first person world. You create the enemy path in real time. The Alpha Stage comes with a free unlocked steam achievement.

name: JumpJump
description: JumpJump is a very popular casual game that only requires pressing and releasing two actions. It is a simple gameplay, but it has a lot of difficulty. Compare who jumps farther and whose score is higher. Come and play!

name: Chrono Hunter
description: Step into the thrilling world of Chrono Hunter, a native VR immersive adventure that combines enjoyment of FPS, Roguelite, and RPG genres. As a time traveler agent equipped with amazing abilities and weapons to explore to experience through diverse and meticulously crafted levels.

name: Drums Rock: Undertale DLC
description: Drums Rock is an arcade drum game for VR, follow the rock rhythm with your drums and crush the demons. Each note is represented by an enemy, and they will be defeated by playing the drums.

name: Requisition VR: Survival Update
description: Requisition VR is a physics based, co-op melee game.

name: Mecha Force
description: Mecha Force is an immersive and exciting VR experience that blends the thrill of mecha action with the unpredictability of a roguelike game. Players are transported to a world in turmoil, where they must defend against both internal and external threats as they take control of their very own mecha. This is no ordinary machine, however; the player is able to customize and personalize their mecha, choosing from a diverse range of artillery and melee weapons to create their own formidable war machine.

name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files
description: Sin descripción

name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files 2 - The Riverside Slasher
description: Sin descripción

name: Chojiro
description:
"The wandering ronin.
Night breeze carries the scent of burnt horse flesh to his nostrils.
He follows it through the weeds, and comes across a village ablaze.
What horrors unfurled here...?"
This is a small horror game on itch.io made for a game jam. Gives ps1 vibes with its visuals.

name: Monster Mop Up
description: Rescue the scared little Ragamuffins from the human world- and clean up all evidence of their existence. Mop stains, burn poop, and get rewarded with high tech gear and upgrades. Save enough, and you can even expand your home, decorate it, and live happily ever after with your fluffy little friends!

name: This Is Crying
description: Traverse distorted memories.

name: World War 0x
description:
World War 0x is a multiplayer FPS game set during a World War 3 conflict with a low poly art style.

The game features real world locations such as Odesa Port.

Tons of weapon options to choose from like rifles, snipers, shotguns, RPGs and pistols.

Vehicles like armored cars, tanks, helicopters and fighter jets help you get around fast.

name: RollerGirl
description: A nostalgic Adventure-Narrative game set in 2010 in small-town Ontario. Explore the local neighbourhood on rollerblades as Naomi

name: Nexomon 3
description: The upcoming third entry in the Nexomon series, featuring a large, story-rich 3D open world and a new battle system.

name: Wing Queen
description: Wing Queen is a 2D platformer, cardgame with metroidvania elements , In Wing Queen you will be able to build a deck and choose the combination of skills you prefer, obtain resources, fight against enemies and bosses.

name: MathGame
description: Are you looking for a math game? Take a look here. In this game, you can experience the joy of mathematics. This game is suitable for primary and secondary schools.

name: DanSparkling
description: Music/Rhythm/Dance game play with just one PC camera. Of course, you can also use your phone camera.

description: Sin descripción

name: My Time at Sandrock: Collector's Edition
description: Pre-order the Collector's Edition of My Time at Sandrock, which includes the digital PC game, a &quotPensky&quot plush toy, a wooden workshop to assemble, a 40-page comic book &quotA Logan Story,&quot two wooden Standees of Logan and Nia, a Builder's License, and additional digital content!

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Dance 2024 Edition: Limited Edition
description: Pre-order the Limited Edition at your retailer to get exclusive additional digital content, including customization items for your Dancer Card, a Victory Celebration, and more!

name: Spreen Game
description: Spreen (twitch streamer) leaves his house to buy an Spreen x Speed energy drink but he will face with a lot mobs, he will pass them succesfully?

name: Space Pirate
description: Space Pirate is a rogue-lite, time-survival space game with active and minimalistic gameplay.

name: Malboro Go!
description: A promotional dirt biking cartridge released by Cigarette company Malboro for the Atari Lynx. This game was one of the rewards smokers could spend points on as part of the Malboro Adventurer Team program.

name: Lil Jump 2
description:
Stack em up, till it all comes crashing down! Lil Jump 2 is a game all about stacking blocks as high as possible! How high can you stack before it all comes crashing down?
Jump as your favorite character with simple 1-tap jump controls. Jumping on a block = 1 stack.

name: Freewheelin
description:
Steer the runaway roly-poly tyre to victory!
Stay on the twisting, hurdling, tricky track for as long as you can, pick up boosters and pump up your tyre for exra strength, but look out for those nasty Totafaces who’ll stop you in your tracks. Riding the renegade Freewheelin’ tyre is just like a metaphor for life…
…sort of.
Show off with stunts and tricks for extra points and kudos, leap the gaps, cut the corners and roll your way into the big leagues with this addictive adrenaline-pumping roller-coaster.

name: Tribio puzzle: Strategic Spot
description:
Help the pelicans hurt by the pollution! Make 3 healthy pelicans to heal the sick pelicans on the puzzle board. Study the puzzle board and connect 3 healthy pelicans to heal the others! A fun new puzzle board game that also helps improve thinking!
This game has been uniquely changed by putting different elements into the match 3 puzzle game genre. Find the right spot of the main Pelican and clear many stages.
Think logically and Intuitively. Connect lines of pelicans in hundreds of levels!

name: PopGerm Classic
description: Touch two or more germs of the same kind. Pop as many germs as you can to move on to the next level.

name: Color Reflex Challenge
description:
Click on the faded colored dot. Concentrate on the dots and increase your speed of clicking.
Color Reflex Challenge has two modes: normal and time trial.
In normal mode, the game begins with a 5 sec time limit and as the game proceeds, you gain additional second in each correct click.
In time trial, you have 100 seconds to play and achieve maximum points within that time limit.
Leader board is the global score sheet which displays the high score of the players in each mode. There are 2 leader boards, Normal mode and Time Trial.
Six achievement levels are available for unlocking, using the highest score achieved in a single game.

name: Cubis Creatures
description:
Slide, Stack and Crack your way to victory in this clever and addictive match 3. Bomb-away for bonuses, fire lasers to rack up score multipliers and trigger epic chain reactions.
Frenetic puzzle action rushes from all sides as you slide, stack, and crack you way to victory. Easy to learn yet difficult to master - only the best and most dedicated players will earn the coveted ‘Perfect’ rating on every level. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Impulse!: Brick breaker
description:
The melodious sound of your actions will immerse You into a fantastic world of incredible shapes. But the most important thing in any game is the gameplay! Try it and you will be carried away in a whirlwind of emotions: excitement, enjoying the beauty and tranquility of the Zen.
Play, collect the pluses, use power-ups, and break to shreds all carefully drawn levels!

name: Block x3
description:
Block x3 is a simple, fun and relaxing puzzle game.
The basics are easy. Solve the puzzles by getting 3 blocks of the same color in a row or column.
Things get challenging however when multiple colors, moving blocks and various puzzle elements are introduced.
If it gets too hard our dynamic hint system will help you by solving only some or all of the puzzle for you.

name: Laser!
description: Sin descripción

name: Matched
description:
Test your brain skills with Matched. A simple yet challengingly tricky game that’ll keep you hooked and on your toes.
Matched is an advanced take on the classic game of memory match and more. Memory match with open faced cards? What? What kind of memory game is that? — It’s not! It’s more than that. Matched will put your hand-to-eye coordination on trial and scrutinize your observation skills.

name: Slingshot Rush
description: Swing around like a slingshot. Tap to shoot and release to let go. Travel as far as possible using simple one touch controls. Play with friends in our classic BoomBit Multiplayer.

name: Sunya
description: An enchanting pixel art platformer that embarks you on a quest to find and wield the immense powers of the four elements: air, earth, water, and fire. Players are granted the ability to transform into different elemental forms at will, enabling them to adapt to and overcome intricate obstacles.

name: Medical Record Sheet
description: The game is a single-player combat roguelike in which you play the role of a doctor who chooses various medical records to treat, and then controls various human immune guards, equipped with a variety of core weapons to enter various areas of the human body to fight against a variety of pathogens.

name: Final Goal
description: This game attempts to provide you with an immersive experience of storytelling and diversity while playing, and has explored some new gameplay methods.
Sin descripción

name: Farewell
description: An emotional RPG with emotion system and combat interactions between characters.

name: Mixed Unit Tactics
description: Mixed Unit Tactics is a medieval turn based strategy where you control a growing army. Command your units well to take advantage of their unique strengths as you push through hostile forces to reclaim your home castle.

name: Floppy Cat Bow Golf!
description: Golf, but you use a bow and launch yourself at the target, Also you're a cat.

name: Break Them All
description: The game type is A Roguelite barrage shooting game, Choose different upgrades after each level, and each upgrade can be integrated to form a unique gameplay. Every game is a brand-new experience. After each customs clearance, the difficulty increases and the playability is enhanced.

name: Boom Boom Football
description: Boom Boom Football requires an iPad 3 (or newer), iPhone 5 (or newer), or iPod Touch 6th Generation.

name: Tug-of-War: Cybertruck
description: Rev up your engines! It's time to see, once and for all, what the Cybertruck can really do! Measure up to multiple challengers, test your skills in different settings and environments, upgrade your truck and take down the competition in one epic tug-of-war.

name: Temple Run: Idle Explorers
description: From the creators of the award-winning Temple Run series with over a billion downloads, comes Temple Run: Idle Explorers. Join Guy Dangerous, Scarlett Fox and the rest of the gang on an epic idle game adventure as you explore strange lands, collect gold, discover rare treasures, upgrade your team’s abilities and try to become the richest explorer of all time!

name: Football Keepy Uppy Champion
description:
Can you keepy uppy a football or soccer ball? Are you Football Keepy Uppy Champion material?
Football Keepy Uppy Champion will tests your reflexes to the max! Try and bounce as many footballs/soccer balls as you can. if any of them drop then it's GAME OVER!

name: Bad Burgers
description:
Let's get ready to rumble!! It's Food Vs Food!
Bad Town has been over run by Bad Burgers with attitude.
Play as Ninja Burger and rid the town of this madness and become King of the Burgers.
Play your favorite Burger in VS Mode against your friends.

name: Soccer Runner
description:
Soccer Runner is a fast and easy runner games inspired by famous 80-90 soccer games.
Pixel art graphic and a strong link with the gold age of soccer games.
Run to save famous soccer teams from the past.
Collect items, jump and relax! It's easy!

name: Stickman Ski
description: Take your skis and hammer down the most beautiful and dangerous mountains in the world! Perform insane jumps and stunts, rush down the hills at full speed and handle various obstacles like avalanches, icy tracks, rocks, ski jumps, steep slopes, snow cannons and moving platforms.

name: Survivor's Guilt: Survival
description:
What would you do if you were trapped in an elevator by a great earthquake?
Can you survive an unprecedented disaster?

name: Crazy Coin
description: Ever thought about collecting money falling down the sky?! Drive yourself crazy as you are collecting gold coins and precious diamonds falling down the sky!

name: Balance The Hat
description:
Tilt heads and balance hats!
See how long you can keep your hat on, and watch out for bombs!
Lots of playable hats to collect—including a top hat, chicken, boombox, beanie, birdcage, cat, rocking horse, fish bowl, soccer ball, cactus, and many more.

name: Spookiz Pop
description:
Go on a thrilling adventure with your SPOOKIZ friends now!
Enjoy limitless Match 3 fun without worrying about hearts!
Match 3 or more of the same colored fruits!

name: Puzzingo
description: Sin descripción

name: Doodle Saver
description: Hooray! Vacation! The whole office is having rest on the sea! Swim, swim and swim again! The true thing is, someone is not so good at swimming but fearless rescuer is on the guard all the time! It's you! Look after the swimmers, beware. Help those who swims bad! The love of savee and a lot of bonuses will be given to you as a reward. Be the best!

name: Strawberry Patch
description: Collect strawberries by grouping three adjacent and similar plants to upgrade them. Then sell them on the market for gold to pursue rarer strawberries and gain levels!

name: Delicious: Emily's Wonder Wedding HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Meet Your Mate
description: We must meet the pair of couples so that we can collect the heart sign from the couples. If the couples lost their patient, then user will not get enough heart and the user cant get the score.

name: The Lost Post
description: Sin descripción

name: Rope Racers
description: SWING, RUN and RACE against other players across the world! Win high-speed races for great rewards. Collect all characters, race in awesome locations and be the best Rope Racer of all time!

name: Super Karts
description: Drive your own racing kart, passing and dodging your opponents and earning gold with Super Karts! Track you scores on the leader board and watch your winnings grow. Develop your driving skills at practice speed. Then power up the action for faster, more challenging racing.

name: Physics Overdrive
description:
It's a very challenging and entertaining 2d physics based race and skill game!
Use your skills to the limit! Try to get on each track bonuses by collecting stars and showing your skills. Use your in-game currency to buy other vehicles. When you fail, choose another vehicle and try a different method!

name: All Stars Racing Jumper
description:
Let's go Time to run
Race anytime, anywhere!

name: Spring Fowler
description:
How could the soldier keep jumping forward so agilely, how great he is!
Come on, check it out!

name: Line Monster: Escape Dark
description:
Line Monster:Dark Escape——A simple puzzle game anyone can enjoy
Line monsters lost in a dark room, help the line monsters find a right way to escape from the dark room.Monsters can only walk a straight line,So you have to arrange for their a correct route.

name: Tub Defenders
description:
A gang of mutant monsters fled the lab of "mutant aquatic animals"
After swimming through the drain pipes they found them selves in the kid's swimming pool and it felt kinda nice.
So they decided to stay and scared all the kids away.
Tap on the monsters to scare them away. But be real careful with the black crab monster it will get really angry.

name: Pinky The Phoenix
description:
Sick of Flappy Bird?
Why don't you try and catch the worms with Pinky?
But beware the objects that are out to get your precious phoenix!

name: Flight Color
description:
Fly in the world of colorful tiles! Flight Color is an endless arcade game in which you’ll have to keep flying along the particular color. The goal is to collect as many colorful tiles as possible.
Control your plane with a simple to play, yet difficult to master one tap steering. Take off and relax while listening to ambient music composed especially for this game. Customize the board’s look by choosing from several aircraft types and various color palettes.

name: Stunt Bunnies Circus
description: The Stunt Bunnies Circus is in town and Jet Bunny needs your help! Wow the crowd and pluck the tumbling circus rabbits from certain death.

name: Flockwork
description:
The sheep dog was just resting his eyes for a moment… but when he opened them, the sheep were gone!!
In Flockwork, your job is to help the sheep back to safety, but there's a catch: all the sheep move together in a flock. You'll need to use your finger and your brain to guide them through 95 stages of puzzles. Bounce sheep off walls, squeeze them through gaps, build bridges… dodge hungry wolves!

name: Let's Spot It!
description: Spot the Difference with 408 Levels, 5 Game Modes and 24 Light Music

name: Fur and Feathers HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Chaves Arena
description: A simple unofficial 3D graphics fighting game featuring characters from El Chavo. It has only two characters (Chavo and Don Ramón) and two stages. It is considered as an evolution of the previous game Street Chaves.

name: Chapolim & Super Sam: A Lenda dos Super Heróis
description: An unofficial overhead arcade shooter featuring El Chapulín and Super Sam.

name: Madruga From Mars
description: An unofficial space shooter featuring Don Ramón from El Chavo.

name: DokiDoki Academy
description: Love Story at the Academy.

name: Maze Horror: Meikyuu Horror
description: An old man lost in an underground labyrinth searches for a key to escape.

name: Can't Be Touched
description: Don't let the evil spirit touch your soul.

name: The Evolving Forest
description:
The Evolving forest is a free to play management game in which you cultivate your own personal plant collection.

Unlock new plant varieties by breeding your specimens together and battle your unique critters together against your friends online.

name: Tracks of Triumph Retro Blast
description: Are you ready to go back in time? Follow Shiny the tank on his journey back to the good old times and adventure through 25 newly designed awesome levels divided into 2 campaigns: The Retro Campaign focuses on your strength while The Blast Campaign will challenge your speed!

name: Payday 2: City of Gold Collection
description: The City of Gold Collection contains everything released between Dragon Heist and Mountain Master, packaging the whole story in one big bundle for anyone who wants to complete their collection.

name: Payday 2: Lawless Tailor Pack
description: The Lawless Tailor Pack is available on its own or as part of the Crude Awakening Bundle.

name: Payday 2: Street Smart Tailor Pack
description: Our new mission in Texas from gun runner Gemma McShay brings us to the heart of Dallas, we want to make sure to look our best, and to look our best - we need to look Street Smart.

name: Payday 2: The Butcher's BBQ Pack
description: Tired of the long, dark nights of howling cold? Over the snow and ice and biting sleet? Well, we at Overkill are proud and excited to bring you a party that is guaranteed to heat things up and blow away the winter blues - the smokin' hot BBQ Weapon Pack.

name: Payday 2: The Butcher's AK/CAR Mod Pack
description: A large shipment is en route to the East Coast containing mods to the most popular classics - the American CAR and the Russian AK. The Butcher's AK/CAR Mod Pack is the 19th DLC pack for Payday 2.

name: Elzzup
description: In Elzzup, your goal isn't to assemble a puzzle, but rather to disassemble it. The variety of tiles and increasingly complex interactions between them might make this task more complex than you think!

name: Pretty Dreadful: Heritage
description: Re:do left his quiet life in a village to pursue his career dreams in a big city. However, time passed and after graduation the guy found himself lonely and lost, not knowing what to do with his life. And that's when Re:do's past came after him and called him back…

name: Breathedge 2
description: Sent on a reckless mission, you find yourself in outer space filled with numerous dangers and things to explore. Build, craft, manage your crew, look after the chicken, and defeat the evil space corporation in this new breathtaking survival game.

name: Earthless
description: Earthless is a sci-fi, roguelike deckbuilder where humankind has been thrust into the cosmic wind on a fleet of starships captained by you. To find a new home, you must draw your own path through the stars and play the hand you’re dealt. You are our hope in the darkness.

name: Exo Rally Championship
description: Exo Rally Championship is the galaxy’s most dangerous off-road racing event - remote, unexplored, extreme exoplanetary rally. Master a brutally realistic racing simulation and fight for every second gained on your quest to become a champion.

name: Chimera
description: Explore a mysterious planet in an ever-changing open world torn by recurring cataclysms. Build a complex industrial system to extract resources, produce goods and expand your base. Fight against hordes of alien monsters to defend your base and survive, alone or with friends.

name: Altered Alma
description: Altered Alma combines the beloved classic Metroidvania formula with RPG elements, dating sim features, a slick pixel-art presentation, and a gripping story. Whether you want to beat up bad guys, find love, or just explore the beautiful cityscape, Neo-Barcelona awaits!

name: Mariachi Legends
description: Mariachi Legends is an action-packed mystery Metroidvania game. In Mariachi Legends, Join fantastical festivities at the Day of the Dead carnival alongside Detective Pablo Cruz, currently masquerading as a mariachi player to investigate an evil curse looming over the serene town of Santa Mascota.

name: Sand
description: Sand is a vast, open world PVPVE game where you explore the fallen planet of Sophie. Build gigantic Tramplers to conquer this hostile environment, filled with mystical anomalies, monuments, and other players. Find out what happened in this fallen world, once ruled by the Austro-Hungarian Empire.

name: Ultimate Apocalypse
description: Ultimate Apocalypse is a mod for Warhammer 40,000 Dawn of War: Soulstorm that increases the amount of playable factions and adds numerous units for each of the factions while also increasing the scale of the game.

name: Clockwork Revolution
description: Clockwork Revolution is a time-bending steampunk first-person RPG. After stumbling across an incredible invention that allows you to travel into the past, you discover the city you call home—the vibrant steam-powered metropolis of Avalon—has been carefully crafted through the alteration of historical events. By traveling back to key moments, your interactions and choices will have a butterfly effect on the deep, narrative-driven world and characters of Avalon, causing them to change and react in unprecedented ways.

name: 33 Immortals
description: 33 Immortals is a co-op action-roguelike for 33 players. Play a damned soul, and rebel against God’s final judgment. Pick-up and raid, cooperate to survive hordes of monsters, defeat massive bosses, and face the wrath of God in a fight for your eternal life.

name: God of Weapons
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in God of Weapons, an action roguelike where you must ascend the tower of Zhor to reclaim the last light for the world. To survive the monster onslaught on each tower's level, you'll need to obtain and carefully organize weapons and accessories in your inventory.

name: Super Monkie Bounce Fatal
description: Reject Humanity, Return to Monke ! In Super Monkie Bounce Fatal, you goal is to make your car reach the end of the track to snatch the win. The catch ? You're not actually driving the car !

name: Half-Life: Hostile Takeover
description: Half-Life: Hostile Takeover is a cancelled Half-Life expansion pack. It was planned to be the second expansion after Opposing Force.

name: Tollan Worlds
description:
Their destiny was changed by a Mark of Fate. Each of them awoke by the ancient altar, revealing their unseen potential. Spread around the continent, they take care of their personal deeds and embark on their own adventures.
Would you dare to become one of them?

name: Warriors Orochi 4: Scenario Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Knight Foretold
description: As a young blacksmith forging armour for the Kingdom, you meet a Stranger in the wilderness that commissions you for a dangerous quest. Through Him your armour receives special blessings, enhancing your combat abilities, and leading you down the path of an old prophecy.

name: The Soulwalkers
description: A singleplayer roguelike autobattler/autochess. Draft a team of champions with synergizing traits that automatically fight your enemies. Carefully position your units and strategically place items. Tailor your gameplay by choosing your battles, finding special events, and discovering unique boons.

name: Resistor
description: A turbocharged narrative-driven adventure RPG featuring open-world exploration, stunt-infused racing, and explosive vehicular combat! Build up your team and unravel a twisting story as you compete to take down an oppressive mega-corporation and its enigmatic director.

name: The Guardian of Nature
description: The Guardian of Nature is an exploration adventure and puzzle game. Go with the botanist Henry on a magical journey to save the mother tree. Use your ability to change in size to explore nature from big to small and solve solar punk puzzles to put nature back in order.

name: Kibu
description: From the creator of Omno, Kibu is a tranquil adventure in the heart of the wilderness. As a solitary monk you must build a temple, brew delicious teas, and journey into the wilds seeking out ancient spirits. Carve out your own special corner of home in a beautiful, mysterious land.

name: GardenBuddies
description: Unleash your inner gardener and immerse yourself in the serene world of Garden Buddies, cultivating a vibrant flower garden alongside your new friend Mutsy. Discover an enchanting and fulfilling experience to release your stress.

name: Loftia
description: Welcome to the floating sky island of Loftia, where you can explore, farm, craft, and more - in the clouds, together with others!

name: I am a Caterpillar
description: Crawl up trees, leap between lily pads, and wriggle through underground caverns as you journey towards your destiny as a caterpillar. Today is the day of your transformation - and you will do anything to stop it.

name: Button City: Soccer Days
description: Rejoin the wholesome cast of Button City as they compete in this cozy soccer adventure! Build your dream team, plan your day, bond with teammates, enjoy action-packed soccer, and win the tournament!

name: Chariot: Royal Gadget Pack
description: The Shopkeeper joins the action, bringing along 5 new gadgets to Chariot! Play as the Shopkeeper in solo or co-op and try out new technology delivered straight from the royal engineers' workshop! Walk on ice, light up the darkness, go swimming in lava, freeze the world in place, teleport the Chariot through time and space, and much more! Also includes new achievements and blueprints hidden throughout existing levels. Help His Downloadable Majesty rest in peace already!

name: Hermit and Pig
description: Hermit and Pig is a turn-based, adventure RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. These unlikely heroes must explore, forage, fight, and overcome unfortunate personal shortcomings to solve the mystery of a sinister corporate plot.

name: Sensations
description: Sensations is a 2D-platformer that focuses on the playable character's emotions. These emotions provide the player with different abilities, alter the game's mood, and present choices for the player.

name: Emote Guesser
description: Emote Guesser is a browser game for twitch users, who are familiar with twitch third party integration tools like bttv and 7tv. You can guess emote names from different channels, with emotes activated. The main goal of the game is to guess the correct names of the emotes in a specific time period. The most challenging part of the game is to guess every emote, with can be 300 emotes for specific channels. Afterwards share your statistics with your friends and see who is the better twitch emote user.

name: KardVenture
description: KardVenture is a survival card game where you play as a legendary hero. Explore mysterious locations, gather resources, build your village and face the challenges ahead, be it a cold blizzard or an orc raid. Stack cards to make combos, craft, build, fight and most important... Survive!

name: Thunder Jack's Log Runner
description: Jump into Jack or Jane's boots and start running now!

name: 3 Shapes
description: Bored of old fashioned matching games that put you to sleep? Then you'll love playing 3 Shapes!

name: Nuclear Combat Ship
description: Welcome Admiral, to the most advanced Naval Battle strategy game. In Nuclear Combat Ship you must guide your fleet to victory by sinking all of the opponent's ships. The way you manage your fleet, armoury and your economy will make the difference in the war effort.

name: Legacy of Solitaire 3D
description:
The Legacy of Solitaire is an unique solitaire game. This game is spectacular, gripping, it contains lots of new game elements, but it is a traditional klondike solitaire.
You can play in a spectacular 3D enviroment, with new game modes and game elements.

name: Slaps and Beans
description: Bud Spencer and Terence Hill in their first virtual adventure. A brand new story! Whether in the Western Saloon, Miami Downtown, at the fairground etc... you'll get the full load of funny conversation, slaps and of course lots of mass brawls.

name: Flip the Birdie
description:
Flip the Birdie! Anywhere and everywhere!
Keep Birdie off the ground and catch those Stars before they blow up!

name: Triangle Dash!
description:
Tap and hold to move the Triangles up the tower.
Try to avoid the obstacles and collect gems to unlock awesome new characters.
How far can you go?

name: Don't Drop the White Ball 2
description: Don't Drop The White Ball 2 - is a game for all ages. Enjoy this new arcade game wherein you have to simply save the falling balls from dropping. Navigate the stick from left to right and stop the balls from dropping while moving up the levels.

name: Multi Impact
description: Smash and crash everything around you. Shoot the cannon at the chess pieces and move through space. Enjoy stylishly beautiful levels filled with puzzles and secrets.

name: Happy Bang Express
description:
Do you need to put your mind at ease, recharge your battery, and refresh yourself?
And how to get rid of anger?
Happy Bang is your therapist!

name: Factory Control Inc.
description:
Get ready to build the ultimate factory and dominate the trading market. Starting from scratch, you'll design production lines, produce goods, and sell them in the market to climb the ranks and earn trade points.
With 12 different building types, transport belts, robotic arms, power generators, and more, you'll have everything you need to create the perfect factory. Shop raw materials from the market, maintain a stock of raw materials, and get loans from the bank when you need extra cash to expand your empire.
But that's not all - you'll also need to research and unlock new items and building types and figure out the most efficient assembly lines. Use the copy-paste function to build faster, and multiply your factory production quickly.
Your objectives are clear: become the ultimate factory by achieving top rank in the trading market, completing all research, and completing the final task. With addictive gameplay, stunning top-down graphics, and intuitive controls, this is the ultimate factory-building and trading experience!

name: Cupcake House: Liv's cupcakes matching sweetness!
description: Cupcake House is a tasty match-3 game just bursting with sweetness!

name: Arcade Cats
description: Puzzles and much more await you with Arcade Cats.

name: Galactic Lords
description: Sin descripción

name: Cipher Zero
description: A defunct world without a guide; glyphs without a manual. A minimalist logic game.

name: Astronauters
description: Astronauters is a stylish arcade shooter with rogue-lite elements where your only goal is to survive the endless wave of enemies that are dangerous enough to defeat you.

name: Forest Horror
description: You have to explore the mysterious forest and complete many tasks to get out of there alive.

name: Fishing Nation
description: Embark on an immersive fishing adventure! Master the art of angling, explore stunning locations, upgrade your gear, and chase legendary catches in this captivating fishing game. Reel in the excitement and become the ultimate fishing master!

name: How to Tame a Succubus
description: After a tragedy in your past, you move to the Cursed Forest to live with monsters. It is there that you are attacked by a succubus. In order to survive her attack, you are able to attain a ring that binds you to her. You must now tame her so that she doesn't drain your life force and kill you.

name: The Richmond Rut: In Search of Fenton
description: Traverse the wild Richmond Park in search of your beloved dog who ran after deer. Beware, everything is out to get you!Respect the deer and remember once you're in the park always check your surroundings.Oh Jesus Christ!

name: Ragdoll Destroyer
description: Your goal is to destroy a ragdoll character. Customize your ragdoll to your liking, select a room, and let the fun begin! Doing more damage to the ragdoll will help you unlock tools, including a crusher, cannon, rocket launcher, spikes, and more.

name: Noah
description: You play as Noah, a child who cannot speak, and travel a world that is destroyed. Travel back in time with the little jellyfish robot and find out why the world is dying.

name: Magic Potion Stories
description: Sin descripción

name: New Age of Machine Warfare
description: A turn-based strategy futuristic sci-fi robot battle chess game

name: Legend of the Ma On
description: This is a pixelated wind turn strategy card that tells the adventure stories of 7 players. Players can use lead a monster army to overwhelm opponents with absolute advantage, or rely solely on a few items to strengthen themselves and kill opponents like a lone wolf.

name: Nightscape
description:
Nightscape is an adventure game about astrology and constellation.

A young girl and her goat friend explore a world where the stars have fallen to earth. Nightscape is a 2.5D atmospheric adventure where you wield stellar powers, explore an ancient Arabian land, and overcome deadly creatures. Help Layla return the stars to the sky and find her missing father.

name: FrontlineGrunt
description: A First-Person Shooter game in which the main goal is to capture and secure objectives in a map and winning by draining other team's conquest points.

name: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis: Sonic Collab - Suits/C-Space Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: I Want to be Alive
description:
Immerse yourself in the cosmic atmosphere filled with many traps!
You have to go through many worlds and dangers.

name: Moto
description: Get on a futuristic motorcycle and go to infinity, maneuvering through traffic, to cyberpunk music.

name: The Silent City Chapter 1
description: Horror Action First Person

name: Influent: Definitive Edition
description: Influent is a 3D Language Learning Game focused on vocabulary acquisition and pronunciation that gives players the freedom to choose what words they want to learn in a way that is more immersive and fun than ever before! The Definitive Edition now includes all 23 languages!

name: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum - Emotes Pack
description: This pack includes 6 iconic emotes inspired by the character Gollum, which you can use to proclaim "my Precious" and express a range of emotions in the game whenever you want.

name: Another World
description: Another World is a "Ready-Player-One" like open world for NFT communities.

name: Dungeon Knight
description: You will play as a brave knight, exploring underground mazes, completing various challenges. Each level in the game is the ultimate platform jumping experience, requiring your precise calculation of jump timing and distance, dodging danger, and finally reaching the finish line.

name: Arcatron-Z
description: Arcatron-Z is a 2.5D sci-fi mech-shooter with fast-paced action and multiple modes. You pilot the most advanced military guardian robot to defend against planet-ripping aliens. Defeat them with an array of weapons before they drain your planet's vital energy!

name: BoltBreak: Powers and Maps Pack
description:
Get ready to go god mode with the new Powers and Maps Pack.

It adds 4 new maps and 5 new powers to the game with a wide range of environments and play styles.

name: Virus Infinite
description: Dive into the pulsating universe of Virus Infinite. Harness your logic to outsmart vibrant viruses, using color-matching prowess and Power Pill strategy in this captivating sci-fi puzzle game.

name: Idle Champions: Pride Marshals Bundle Pack
description: The Pride Marshals Bundle Pack includes a Skin and Feat Pack for Kent, as well as a Skin & Feat Pack for Virgil, bundled at a discount! Get your pride on today!

name: Payday 2: Cartel Optics Mod Pack
description: The Mexican cartels have access to the very best weapons technology that money can buy. As the Payday Gang travels to Mexico, they can pick up a range of advanced mods. The Cartel Optics Mod Pack DLC includes 10 new weapon mods, with a focus on optics and sights.

name: Emkayo
description: Action-packed first-person shooter game designed to enhance your skills and reflexes.

name: Gunmetal Gothic
description: A co-op shooter-RPG with a retro-3D aesthetic. Customize and upgrade your character as you take back the city of Vestige from demonic machines!

name: Maiden's Reception: Shoujo-tachi no Danmaku Hirouen
description: This is spellcard collection for Danmakufu Ph3.

name: Strikethrough
description: STRIKETHRØUGH - Your next favorite endless parkour running experience. Available very soon!

name: Geometry Race
description: Race in the crazy world of geometry shapes. Aim towards the setting sun and watch out for obstacles that will try to push you off the track.

name: GoFish: Avoid the Dams
description: Tap and hold to swim fast and speed through the gaps. Zip past multiple dams in a row to earn extra points.

name: Go Go Fast
description: Put your reflexes to the test as you make deliveries, pick up passengers, save lives, play as a goat, and so much more in this quirky endless runner!

name: Got Got
description: The cops are chasing you. Don't Get Got. Smash into the traffic to score extra points. Avoid the police, SWAT, helicopters, and road blocks. Race around the city streets avoiding the cops and completing the mini-missions.

name: Hidden Object: Los Angeles Detective Gold
description: Hidden Object Los Angeles Detective Absolutely free and intriguing game in the style of "I find" and "Hidden Object"! The detective in Los Angeles is an exciting and interesting story. Find all the hidden objects to solve the crime in Los Angeles.

name: I Love Pasta
description:
We invite you to I Love Pasta! Order social dishes from the beautiful 2nd floor terrace. The more you play, the more special bonuses there is for you to enjoy!

Produce various ingredients all over the world, and make new menus at your restaurant! When you complete a new menu, you will find landmark items for decorating the distinctive market towns of each country or new patrons will visit your restaurants.

name: Chicco App Toys Blocks
description: Look how easy it is to build objects and colourful characters with simple clicks. Choose the right blocks and complete the figures. The game does not end here. The app really does interact with the Chicco constructions. Frame the special bricks and discover the magic from your tablet.

name: California Waves
description: Amped to surf the biggest waves? Ride the tube like never before, no ankle busters here!

name: Battle Recruits
description: Battle Recruits is a fun, fast-paced 'Snake'-like Tower Attack game, where you can choose to play as one of many unique Heroes, all with specialized abilities! Gather your troops on the battlefield while avoiding the dangerous obstacles, then unleash them in order to destroy the enemy castle!

name: Legacy 4: Tomb of Secrets
description:
This game is designed to immerse you in a world of mystery and intrigue, with stunning 3D graphics and physics-based puzzles that will challenge even the most experienced players.
Step into the shoes of a young archaeologist and explore the hidden secrets of an ancient tomb. With an immersive point-and-click interface, you'll be able to interact with your surroundings in a way that feels natural and intuitive. Each room in the tomb presents a new challenge, with puzzles that will test your intelligence, creativity, and problem-solving skills.
But be warned, the tomb is full of surprises, and someone may be watching your every move. Keep an escape plan in mind at all times, and use your wits and instincts to uncover the truth behind the tomb's mysterious past.
As you progress through the game, you'll uncover clues and collect items that will help you piece together the tomb's history and the people who built it. Use your touch controls to inspect objects and take photos of anything that catches your eye, and immerse yourself in the world of the ancient tomb.
What sets Legacy 4 apart from other puzzle games is its innovative hint system. If you find yourself stuck on a puzzle, don't worry. The game's built-in hint system will guide you through the most challenging puzzles, ensuring that you never get stuck for long. And with a range of difficulty levels to choose from, you can customize your experience to match your skill level and preferences.

name: Next: Merger with Power of 2
description:
Swipe (Left, Right, Up, Down) to move blocks on the field and merge tiles. The field moves until reaching the Left/Right/Up/Down wall.
Plan your moves using the next tile, earn points and reach the highest level during one play.

name: Petrolhead Paradise
description: Welcome to Petrolhead Paradise, the digital playground for all car lovers around the world! Are you ready to sit behind the wheel of many different iconic cars and earn in-game money by speeding and drifting across over 25 environments, even across endless highway roads? Test your skills in over 60 difficult career challenges consisting of Time Attack, Autocross and Drift events. Show off your driving skills in order to unlock many amazing cars and mods and also play with your friends in an online free roam multiplayer mode or compete with them in multiplayer drag races!

name: Ping Pong 3D HD
description: Play the ultimate classic game in amazing 3d graphics. Play through 4 unique levels with 3 difficulty settings. Use your finger or accelerometer to control your bat and defeat the opponent. 4 unique levels including Arctic, Space, Machine, Egyptian and a hidden level.

name: Podageddon
description: Soon there will be a revolution, Mass transportation has hit the skies. "Pods" have taken over as the top mode of transport. The car is dead. Illegal racing is popular, and fatalities have soared. Fed up with these activities, authorities have run Pod racers out of town. They have taken to the deserts and oceans. This arrangement has been working well, but a disturbing and deadly new sport is emerging.

name: Power Rangers: Unite
description:
Unite rangers, zords, weapons and villains from all 22 epic seasons of Power Rangers!
Power Rangers: Unite is the official collectible card game of the Power Rangers!
An all-new story brings together Power Rangers from all seasons, fighting to save Earth from the villain NeroDark. Only teamwork, loyalty and friendship can win this battle!

name: Real Moto
description:
Experience the top tier mobile motorbike racing! Surpass maximum speed around the circuit. Let the speed awaken your instincts and experience the real motorbike racing!
Ride the best Super Motorbikes and experience the racing adrenaline. Campaign mode’s difficulty varies depending on the tracks. Break the world records with your skills!

name: Puzzle 26: The 7th Day
description:
The developer of Doodle Kart announces Puzzle “26”, a puzzle solving game unlike any games that you’ve ever played. Looking for something challenging but also entertaining for your day? Puzzle “26” is the perfect App providing dozens of hours of fun for you. The game is inspired from the traditional game: Minesweeper. However, Puzzle “26” is much more challenging. All the puzzles include 4 different symbols instead of mines. The game rule is so simple that you just need to put the right Egyptian symbols into the right boxes according to the hints.
The game is easy at the beginning, but it becomes harder and harder at the higher levels. The last 20 puzzles are specially designed for genius. If you’re a puzzle lover, this game is definitely your choice.

name: Real Driving Simulator 23
description: Do you love cars? Real Driving Simulator is the best driving simulator that features more than 100 vehicles and a huge open-world map to explore. A big selection of vehicles is waiting for you: sedans, supercars, off roaders, SUVs and more, with realistic engine sounds and accurate interiors! Drive across Europe, complete many challenges like track racing, drag racing, consumption challenge, high speed driving, no damage challenge and many more! Compete with your friends in the Online Multiplayer mode!

name: Repeat: A Memory Game
description: Watch the tiles. Repeat the sequence. Focus your mind.

name: Rocket Chimp
description:
Ham the chimp is about to embark on his first out-of-this-world adventure!
Control Ham's rocket ship using the accelerometer to avoid asteroids, comets, satellites and other space junk! Use your shield to blast through if you get into a bind!
But don't forget to collect fuel canisters or you'll be parachuting back to Earth.

name: Tap Space: Reaction and Focus Training
description: There are 2/3 lanes on the game screen, and spaceship on those lanes. Those spaceships headed to another planet, and obstacles waiting on their way, so you have to help them to avoid those obstacles. It can be asteroids, space mines, even UFOs. To avoid the obstacles you need to tap the lane your spaceship on, and it will move from side to side.

name: Vengeance RPG
description: Vengeance is a single-player RPG in which you can immerse yourself in a story accompanied by beautiful music and atmosphere. Your journey will be rewarded with legendary and mythical items.

name: ZoroMe
description:
ZoroMe is a 3D-puzzle game with dice that challenges to the limits of the player’s mind!
Experience rich content with simple gameplay. A rainbow die will help you get astronomical scores! Compete with players from across the world for a higher score!

name: Undershadows
description: Welcome to Undershadows. In this point and click RPG you control a child who has been robbed of his soul and being dragged into a dark world.

name: Kazu Adventures
description: Turn-based combat with timed counters. Defeat countless stages of enemies by using your reflexes to counter their attacks and deal massive damage.

name: Magi's Dream
description: Enter the Magi's Dream. Survive endless waves of enemies while getting stronger by using the arcane powers of the Magi! Push your creative limits in this pixel art reverse bullet-hell. How long can you survive the dream?

name: Math Ascension
description: Master multiplication by competing in math races against the gladiators of the Calculuseum, unlocking and combining different powers to cross the finish line before your opponent. Math Ascension adapts to all levels, and was designed to help boost players' confidence in math.

name: Dungeon Mutation
description: Warriors trapped in the dungeon, challenging the constantly changing environment of the dungeon

name: TV Head: Eight Pages
description: You find yourself all alone in the middle of a dark forest. You have no weapons and no place to wait for help. The dim flashlight that lights the way is your only friend. Your goal is to explore the location to find eight pages and leave this frightening place.

name: Warlock's Gantlet
description:
Warlock's Gantlet is a sword & sorcery themed, first person, open world, action-RPG with "Indiana Jones-style" puzzles (find and use clues such as maps, notes, drawings etc. to solve environmental mysteries).

You play as a warlock-in-training who has been tasked by their masters to retrieve a valuable item that was stolen from them. They have decided that this opportunity shall serve as a test of your general aptitude and your continued study with them depends on your success.

name: Zombiepede
description: Upgrade your weapons in this defense shooter to shoot your way alone or with up to 4 friends in couch coop through endless hordes of different creatures and missions.

name: Tank and Roll
description: Tank And Roll is an Action-Shooter game that challenges players achieve the highest score! There are features such as unlocking new vehicles, drawing your own vehicle, and importing custom avatars for your character! It offers both fun and a rewarding challenge for those who dare to master it!

name: Kidnapped
description: Solve the mysterious kidnapping of beloved actress Sebastiana Sax. In this one-player mystery game, you must decipher clues and interrogate witnesses to get to the bottom of this heinous crime. Can you solve the mystery in time?

name: Human Fall Flat 2
description: Team up and let your creativity run wild in Human Fall Flat 2, the outrageous new sequel to the much-loved capers of everyone’s favourite physics-based human friends.

name: Summerhill
description: Summerhill is a story-driven puzzle game in which you play as a young shepherd and their dog. Journey across an ancient, pastoral landscape to reunite your scattered flock, and unearth the mysteries of a long-forgotten past.

name: Cart Life
description: An expanded game of Cart Life (2010) which shares the same name with the originally released game.

name: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
description: Take control of one of the commandos, team up with your friends and send the Sludge God and its horde of things-that-should-never-be back to the underworld. Choose the class that matches your playstyle, pile into your favorite ride, and unload an array of gunfire, grenades, special abilities, and freaking katanas as you save the planet.

name: Aim Shooter Game
description: AIM shooter game is good game to practise aim before playing main fps shooters.

name: Obama Boss Fight: Bad Trip
description: Obama has no chill. He has returned and you have to embark on an adventure to stop him. Everything depends on you again. There is no turning back. It's all or nothing.

name: Wild West Pistolero
description: In this arcade-inspired indie title you take on the role of bounty hunter Jules! Hunt legendary bandits of the Wild West, shoot your way through hordes of criminals, ride across the prairie and, of course, collect lots of money!

name: SimpleTD
description: A Simple Tower Defence Game. Build, Loot, Buy & Sell, Level Up, Quest... Controllable Difficulty, Custom Gameplay, Ingame Help.

name: PebbleDash
description: Race online as pebbles in this blazing non-stop, unpredictable multiplayer platformer! From drunk mode, to golfing; no match is like the last! But why are the pebbles racing? Find out in a short, yet vivid story mode, featuring a rich and luminous cast of characters with charming dialogue.

name: Heavenscape
description: Heavenscape is a 3D horror roguelike meant to invoke PC Games from the early 2000s. You play as a character named ANGEL, who is an angel traveling home from a party at night. Find a path home, meet friends and avoid dangers. Be careful - if your phone's battery runs out, its over...

name: Crypt Lord
description: A fantasy RPG designed to give you a quick dose of dungeon crawling adventure. Find ancient runes to augment your equipment, allowing you to mix & match magical effects. Delve deep into dungeons, find enemies, gather loot, and offer sacrifice to your ancestors to increase your strength.

name: Pokémon Tectonic
description: Explore the Makya region, where old and new collide. Host to dozens of ancient caves and tunnels, Makya was settled anew by the disbanded members of Team Chasm, who 20 years ago sought the power of the Regis. When a strange new group puts those plans back into motion, the people of Makya need a newcomer like yourself to delve deep and find the truth.

name: Smash Mania
description:
Hack, hackle, cut, break, explode, SMASH everything in sight – in Smash Mania total destruction will be your aim!
Destroy various barriers and crash all on your way, using different weapons. Juicy fruits and expensive wines mustn’t stay on the shelves, smash them as soon as possible. Act like a shot in changeable game situations!

name: Glorkian Warrior
description: In Glorkian Warrior, you play as a cadet out to prove his worth and maybe get a promotion or two. Your trusty Super Backpack will help you fend off the incoming attackers by firing a constant stream of lasers into the sky. Grab power-ups dropped by the enemies to gain temporary access to some Glorkin' good weapons. And if anything is too low to shoot, leap over it! It's good, classic shoot-em-up fun.

name: Marlo: Merlin's Halls
description:
Help Marlo to save the princess captured by the evil Merlin.
Tap your way through Merlin's evil minions, defeat Merlin and save the princess!

name: Ninja Go!!
description:
Began training hard to become the strongest ninja.
Is a prerequisite for speed and agility of a ninja.
You need to be hard and difficult for novice ninja ultimate ninja force you.
Ultimate ninja way depends on your hands.

name: Funny Circus 2
description: The fun continuous in the Funny Circus 2, With More games and Places. Check out 4 different locations. have fun outside in the yard, jungle,Pipo´s house and the north Pole.

name: Simply Ludo
description: Ludo is a simple board game for two to four players. In the game, the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to dice rolls.

name: Moonlight Drive
description:
Immerse yourself in a night ride with super jet cars through a city of the future in Moonlight Drive.
Enjoy the jet car driving thrill in one of the best 3D flying car games and prove that you can fly drive through heavy traffic full of flying vehicles.

name: Hungry Pets
description:
Meet Aphelia Ellis, an aspiring entrepreneur trying to startup her pet care business!
Join her in this unique physics puzzle game that will challenge your logic / problem solving skills and perhaps learn something along the way in terms of what it takes to manage a pet care business!

name: Kubes
description: Can you lead the kubes to safety? Are you fast enough to control them all?

name: Ghost Files: Mienai Hannin wo Sagase
description: Sin descripción

name: Chokotto Study Mijika na Kotoba
description: Sin descripción

name: Aiten Eishi: Blue Guardians
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Battle Sensha
description: Sin descripción

name: Zotto suru Kowai Toshi Densetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Forklift Extreme: Ultra DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Talk to Strangers
description: Sin descripción

name: Nanuk: The dusk of the brutes
description: An incredible 2d platform game, of a hero from the cave age, fighting against great enemies to free his people from a spell and rescue his beloved.

name: Down Under
description: Experience a game like it was 1995!

name: The Red Sun
description: A challenging 2-D platformer about exploring a ruined city, defeating robotic invaders, and discovering the truth behind the mysterious Red Sun.

name: New Lands 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade Edition
description: This DLC adds Arcade Mode, new playable character Meteor Temujin, and more!

name: Dark Deity II
description: Verroa is a peaceful continent on the brink of war as the Asverellian Empire seeks to expand - at your homeland’s expense. Command unlikely heroes, fight challenging turn-based battles, and watch hardship forge iron into steel. Dark Deity is back, bigger and better than before!

name: A Bonnie Odyssey
description: An open world sci-fi adventure set in the Scottish wilds. A tale of a father and daughter separated by time. A Bonnie Odyssey is a retrofuturist puzzle mystery where you’ll explore an enigmatic abandoned island, unravel the secrets of your own past, and make odd little friends along the way.

name: Toxic Crusaders
description: The Toxic Crusaders return for an all-new, all-action beat 'em up for one to four players! Grab your mop, tutu and attitude, and get ready to clean up the mean streets of Tromaville, one radioactive goon at a time!

name: Dwarf Delve
description: In this first-person extraction roguelite adventure, strap on your gloves, grab your Battlemallet, and explore randomly-generated mines as a new Delveling. Gather riches, avoid deadly hazards and try to make it out with your beard intact!

name: Forgotlings
description: Forgotlings is a breathtaking cinematic action-adventure set in a magical land of sentient forgotten objects.

name: No Man's Sky: Singularity
description: The new No Mans Sky update, Singularity, continues the narrative arc that began in the Interceptor update and will progress throughout this year. In this five-week long expedition, players investigate strange robots that are delivering cryptic clues across the galaxy, following a story tangled in AI corruption. Watch the trailer for a peek at what's coming to the adventure survival game this time around.

name: Personal Sam-Y
description: A SAM-Y of your very own.

name: Winnie's Hole
description: Join Winnie the Pooh on a new adventure, from within! You play a virus in Winnie's body, capture cells to grow mutations and specialise your host. Refine his primitive form, adapt for survival, and do not let his friends contain you. They do not understand our gift... We must share it with them.

name: Diver Dogs
description:
The evil Rocktopi have petnapped hundreds of puppies and dragged them beneath the ocean. It's up to Sharkie and the diver dogs to rescue them in time!
From the makers of GoNinja and ShaqDown comes a new action racing game for your mobile device. Master the art of drift boosting and use your racing skills to rescue lost puppies from under the sea and bring them to safety!

name: Rush 'Hower
description:
Jessie Trucker (aka J.T.) is the best at trucking. J.T. just wants to go home to Las Vegas with some Colorado love... But when J.T. runs into ski rush hour in the icy mountains of Colorado, putting on the brakes leads to Just Trouble!
How far can J.T. make it down the treacherous, never-ending windy roads of Eisenhower Pass without meeting a terrible end?

name: Extreme Truck Parking Simulator Game
description: Ready for a Real extreme trucking Challenge?! Drive 3 huge new trucks around the realistic Truck Driving Test Courses. Learn to master these epic vehicles, including the unique Multi-Wheeler with 3 interesting steering modes to use, a specialized truck with a massively long Trailer and a Road Train Truck with two container trailers attached! Take on the Ultimate Trucker Driving Test Challenge today!

name: Mad Truck Challenge
description:
Get ready to roll with Monster Trucks!
Gear up for roaring, action-packed race battles against the meanest Monster Trucks you’ve ever seen! They’re waiting for you at the Mad Truck Challenge starting line. Strap up for a relentless racing simulator that will have your adrenaline pumping. Select your truck, armed with rockets, and race against the toughest off-road drivers on the planet. Crush and blast your way to victory while you perform extreme stunts and make your opponents bite the dust to earn the coveted MTC trophy.

name: Cruise Control
description: Escape pursuing cops, helicopters, dinosaurs, giant eagles and vector polygons. With easy to pick up gameplay, three endless levels and rocking 80's inspired graphics and soundtrack! Grab powerups and coins to clear the road and unlock all the cars!

name: Swipe Manager: Soccer 2018
description:
Think you could do a better job than Gareth or Pep? Do you have what it takes to motivate teams of overpaid prima donnas while keeping your Chairman onside, stopping the fans from protesting outside your home, and the press from running that story about a donkey? Take the job of managing one of the league’s biggest clubs, or work your way up with a team of relegation strugglers - the choice is yours.
Whether it's dealing with terrible VAR decisions, players going rogue or greedy agents, Swipe Manager: Soccer 2018 is a ‘choose your own adventure’ game where you call the shots. Make all the key decisions via a card dragging mechanic – simply move the card left or right to see your choice of answers and then let go to select.
Each season promises to be filled with tough calls and nail biting football action where you call the shots and define the tactics. This is management like you've never experienced before! Unless you played Swipe Manager: Soccer last year...

name: Super Hit Baseball
description: Fun 2 Inning Baseball Games ! Quick Tap Baseball Battles - The Best in Action Arcade Sports Games! Fun Free Online multiplayer PVP Baseball games

name: Magical Girl Maho
description: The more I play the game, the more become difficult to quit! Contrary to the waffy and kawaii appearance, a full-scale, addictive card game with deep strategic nature appeared! Maps, cards, items, all change every time you play the game... Collect cards and build a deck from lots of choices! Become the brain of cute but a bit blunder witch, “Maho”, Beat the sweets burglar “Biscuit Baron!”

name: Starship Survivor
description:
Starship Survivor by Brainium is a thrilling new rogue-lite shoot ‘em up game! Experience the action as you battle hordes of alien monsters that are terrorizing the universe. From the moment your ship leaves the Hangar it is a race against time to defeat enemies and collect all of the resources you can before the indestructible Void Monsters arrive. Collect power crystals to level-up an arsenal of automated weapons to survive waves of vicious alien enemies. There is nowhere to hide; the only option is to charge your starship’s Jump Drive enough to escape the onslaught of dangerous monsters. Use coins to unlock weapons, items, and permanent upgrades that will help you complete objectives and survive against increasingly powerful and multiplying enemy invaders in sectors to come.
Starship Survivor is a galactic time survival game with the best virtual joystick ever created! Enjoy retro space shooter elements, intuitive controls, unique gameplay, and increasingly powerful enemy invaders that will put your skills to the test. See how long you can collect, destroy, power-up, and survive.

name: SkyFall Slime: Freefall Feast
description:
"SkyFall Slime: Freefall Feast" is the ultimate freefall game designed for thrill-seekers of all ages! With its vibrant cartoony visuals, easy-to-learn controls, and challenging gameplay, your aerial journey will never be the same!
Our characters, lovable mixes of slime and balloon, tumble from the sky, shrinking as they fall. Keep them plump by swiping to collect falling food, but beware! The sky isn't as friendly as it seems. Dodge dangerous spikes that can instantly deflate your character and end your thrilling descent.
As you navigate this airborne world, pick up precious pearls to unlock new characters. With a myriad of colorful, cartoony characters to choose from, you'll find endless joy as you take to the skies.

name: Echo Blade
description:
A strategic, satisfying, slash 'em up puzzle game that will have you hooked from the first swipe.
Ready to join our hero on a thrilling quest across 3 unique worlds? Harness your strategic skills across 21 thrilling levels, facing off against diverse enemies, each with their own distinct behaviours.

name: Metro Pocket
description: In a cartoonish world, you can unlock and upgrade 300 metro stations around the world! Workers including controllers, cleaners, and police officers will help you maintain peace in your stations. With numerous missions to complete and hidden surprises waiting, are you ready to become the master of the metro?

name: Yamb
description: Yamb is dice game played with 5 or 6 dices. It is more complex variant of popular international Yahtzee game.

name: Starmate
description: Once you’ve rescued your first Starmate you won’t be able to stop until you’ve saved them all. These cute creatures are here to help you take down the Keplers, evil aliens who are bent on destroying the galaxy!

name: Legend of Hidden Flows
description: 《Legend of Hidden Flows》It is a sandbox Immortal cultivation game that combines strategy card construction, open world ,and role-playing.You can experience a different life in this world.

name: Idle Magic Legend
description: Team up to kill monsters and explode equipment. Through the program, thousands of people practice, make friends, and get married. You can also participate. You can become friends with her and learn magic together. Bring your dog to battle

name: Kāla
description: You were born in a mining colony far below the surface of Planet Kāla, sentenced to an indefinite quarantine. Legends suggest that the spirit of the planet, Gaia Kāla helps those who prove their worth. Can you escape the grasp of Synterra's Mineral Corporation?

name: NextNight
description: This is a third person tower defense game where you need to use the space wisely to place defenses to kill zombies at night.

name: Oome
description: "In oOme, control time with your mouse, make the celestial bodies dance, feed your black hole, but avoid contact. A relaxing and hypnotic arcade game."

name: Pixel Punk
description: Pixel Punk is a strategy tower defence. In pixel Punk you build different turrets that will protect you against the never ending waves.

name: Riverflow
description: Let the river flow, and nourish the land.

name: Street Fighting Grandma
description: Guide the Grandma through the mean streets and figure out what is really happening in the city

name: The Silicon Shadow
description: An early 1900's retro futuristic sci-fi Movement Shooter. Glide and shoot through murderous robots, navigate platforming challenges and explore a dark and atmospheric space station to uncover the truth of its downfall in this short length game.

name: Hot Rider
description: Dynamic racing with a good soundtrack, compete with the rest and become the best!

name: Gentlemen's Puzzle Club
description: Try to complete all puzzles in this amazing relaxation game and collect all locked girls behind the covers.

name: Gulch Guardians
description: cute + tough card tactics autobattles

name: Hungry Dogs
description: Quick arcade strategy hungry fun getting items in the backyard of wild dogs that hungry in wild.

name: Cynostone
description: An ALL NEW RPG with skill based combat and enemies you can befriend!

name: Fenrir's fury
description: Unleash Fenrir's vengeance. Explore, fight enemies, and make crucial decisions. Trust no one. Seek revenge.

name: Cyber Dose
description: Part puzzler, part farm-sim, part cyberpunk, part serious game. You are an AI databot in a new neural network in the HeXR Cloud. Gather data on digital twins of illicit drugs beamed in by AI health bots. Build your neural network. Stay BOOSTED while completing tasks or you could end up in bot rehab.

name: Cozy Cabin: Coffee Boutique
description: Cozy Cabin is a first-person coffee making game set in a scenic mountain hideaway. Players run a coffee shop and play mini-games to progress an endearing narrative. Physics-based coffee making, unique characters, lively music, and an enchanting atmosphere make Cozy Cabin the game for you! Order up!

name: CityDriver: Ferdinand Habanero Turbo
description: Expand your vehicle fleet with a Ferdinand Habanero Turbo, a sleek SUV whose name says it all!

name: Slayer
description: Step into the unforgiving world of Slayer. Fight your chances with or without friends in a chaotic attempt for survival. Discover new ways to better your odds against new foes, and uncover the truth behind this anarchy. Do you accept the challenge? How long will you survive...

name: White Blade
description: Strategic turn-based combat, utilizing various complementary skills to deal with enemy attack patterns.

name: Whimre
description: whimRE is an atmospheric open-world adventure. Complete missions to escape through a portal while surviving against hostile enemies with limited resources using various weapons or stealth tactics. Choose from 3 sets, each with unique advantages. Strategize, fight, and find your way off the island!

name: VR travel as a little tiny small dwarf
description: This is a leisure game based on 3D VR technology. Players can take small roller coasters to visit different scenes.

name: Unibat
description: Real-time strategy Unibat is a game where you build your own kingdom and manage them, train knights and fight against enemy camps of orcs.

name: Under the Stars
description: Battle Survival Game,Explore maps and defeat enemies.Use mouse and keyboard to control the game.There is a loading time when the game starts.

name: Little White Man vs. X
description: Attention: Attention, attention, attention!!! Sometimes the game automatically locks enemies, press the tab key to unlock it. (At the beginning, pressing tab is to lock the enemy) Other operations are in the legal terms

name: Deathloop: Deluxe Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Atlas Fallen: Limited Edition
description: Pre-order Atlas Fallen:\ Limited Edition now to get the game's official Steelbook, a metal poster, the game on the platform of your choice and the Ruin Rising Pack DLC!

name: Hentai World: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyctoban
description: You must put all the lamps on their places. You have nyctophobia (fear of the dark) but don't worry, you can do it!

name: Train Kit for A-Ressha de Ikou 2001
description: Sin descripción

name: Vectaria.io
description: Multiplayer browser game in block style, where you can build houses, craft various items, digging dungeons and mines, trade with players and much more!

name: Back 4 Blood: Day One Steelbook Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Human: Fall Flat - Dream Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Fighter Online
description: Hard-core street fighters, bring it on!. Show us what you’ve got.

name: Hard Racing
description: Hard Racing is a top-down racer style with Stunning and photorealistic Graphics.

name: Famory
description:
Famory is a game to train and test your memory, there are 144 levels for adults and 36 levels for younger children in the Kids Mode. There are levels with animal sounds, musical instruments, vehicles and of course a lot of levels with (lots of different) images.
Your concentration and your memory can improve by playing Famory. It's not the ultimate cure for Alzheimer or other brain diseases but it's always good to train your brain and stay mentally fit in a fun way!

name: Cupky Jump
description:
Have you ever played running games like Temple Run, Subway Surfers or jumping games like Geometry Dash, Doodle Jump? Now get more of the exhilarating running, jumping and turning you love in Cupky Jump!
Jump and Jump, fly your way in the world of cake and candy, collect the hidden gems to perfect the score!

name: Dice Craft
description:
It is the first, real-time, strategic game to construct buildings by moving the board with dice, collect resources, and knock the opponent with bombardment and magic.
This is the real-time game opponent and I move at the same time.

name: DaiPyooon
description:
Daikon radish jumps.
Avoid obstacles and aim for the high score.
A new action game with simple controls.

name: Domino Merged Puzzle
description:
Classic Domino Merged Puzzle is free now. It's the most famous puzzle and brain game.
As a classic puzzle game, Domino Merged Puzzle is popular for a long time. No matter elderly, women,children,housewives or pretty girls all love Domino Merged Puzzle. Domino Merged Puzzle is a very funny and happy game. Enjoy it with your family.

name: Dungeon Mania
description: Sin descripción

name: Brothers: Clash of Fighters
description:
Brothers: Clash of Fighters is the official game of the Brothers Bollywood movie starring Akshay Kumar and Sidharth Malhotra. It is an arcade street fighting game featuring one-on-one close combat fight style with 3D animated life like characters of Akshay and Sidharth as well as a roster of international fighters.
Compete as David or Monty in arcade mode and fight the greats of MMA wrestling over 3 rounds in one killer battle for supremacy. If you’re in it for the long run, then compete in the tournament mode where each fight is more difficult than the next and the stakes are higher than ever. Win every match or face a disgraceful knockout in this war of the legends.

name: Break the Balloons: Ghost Town
description:
Ghost Town is a perfect kingdom for all kind of fears and horrors until...
The Cats came. And they can detect Ghosts, disturb them, hunt them...
You, the new Ghost hero in Town, lead us to destroy all Cat's balloons to drop them, bring back fear to the land!

name: Bash It!
description: A game of pesky moles!

name: Jurassic Dinosaur
description:
Welcome to Jurassic Dinosaur, the dino park management game where you can build and expand your very own prehistoric paradise! Create a Jurassic playground for your visitors by unlocking and nurturing a wide range of realistic and awe-inspiring dinosaurs. From the mighty T-Rex to the gentle Brachiosaurus, these prehistoric beasts require your utmost care and attention to ensure they are well-fed, healthy, and happy.
But it's not just about the dinosaurs - you must also design and construct your park to attract visitors and generate revenue. Build roads, amenities, and attractions, and use your earnings to expand and enhance your park. Strategically place amenities to keep visitors happy, and monitor the health and happiness of your dinosaurs to ensure their well-being.
As the park owner, it's up to you to make strategic decisions that will impact the success of your park. Use research to unlock new dinosaur species and features, and stay ahead of the game by managing natural disasters and dinosaur diseases that will test your management skills and keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.
With endless hours of entertainment, Jurassic Dinosaur is a thrilling mobile game that offers something for everyone, from dinosaur enthusiasts to park management fans. Download now and start your own prehistoric adventure today!

name: Love Me Not
description:
Love Me Not is inspired by the childhood game of picking the petals off of flowers to guess the interest of your crush.
Pick petals to defend your flower from bugs. Break hearts to revive your flower. Survive as long as you can to beat your friends’ hi score. Your garden is constantly changing with vibrant colors as the cosmos scrolls across the sky.

name: Matchsticks
description:
Keep your mind active with this classic matches game!
The rules are simple: you must create triangles, squares or fix simple equations by adding, moving or removing matches.

name: Memory Color!
description: The best memory cards game ever! Simple graphics, smooth operation, gorgeous visual effect and the unique endless mode! It's the time to challenge your memory!

name: Parking Tycoon
description:
Park on your friend's streets, or catch them parking illegally on yours and write them a huge ticket!
Fully customize your fleet of cars with an array of car modifications that span from whimsical to awesome!
Ticketing is the real fun. The longer you keep cars parked on your friends’ streets, the more money you'll earn, but be careful. Your friends are waiting to steal your cash with ticketing all over the time.

name: Num Yumms
description:
Num Yumms is a surprisingly adorable game about numbers and hungry little monsters.
Move your freshly hatched Num Yumm around the board eating numbered candies. You have 5 moves to total your Num Yumm’s goal. Watch them grow as they eat, discover new Num Yumms, and get the highest score you can.

name: Ro Sham Bo Rush
description:
Rock-Paper-Scissors, RoShamBo, Jan Ken … All these modern games are variations of the Chinese games introduced in the 17th century.
Never played Rock Paper Scissors before? No problem! It's easy! Rock crushes scissors; paper covers rock; scissors cuts paper.
Easy, right? But if it was so easy…

name: Steampunk Racing 3D
description: In the realm of steampunk racing domination and destruction is a way of life. Each day we risk death for the rewards and thrills of our chosen path. We are the racers, the heroes of our war torn world. Our vehicles shield us, our weaponry brings forth our vengeance, the world is our playground, and the corporations that run things are a necessary evil.

name: Tap Dash
description:
Tap Dash is the frantic, high-tension, addictive arcade dasher that’ll have your heart racing and your hands sweating!
Race to dodge dangerous hazards, rack up your multiplier, and dash through the portal to score big and rule the leaderboard!

name: To-Fu Oh! Sushi
description: You are the veritable sushi master! Prepare your own fun sushi with “Daizu” the skunk!

name: Turtle Invaders
description: The turtles have decided to take over the underwater Aqua world. The fearless Octoremus has decided to fight back!! In order to stop the turtles, Octoremus must ink the turtles, which magically transport them back to their own lair. The turtles, of course, can fight back.

name: Yatzy Addict+
description:
